Mozart’s brief life exemplified a discrepancy between fame and means: as his musical star (i) _________ beyond measure, his income (ii) _________.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) abated
(D) grew exponentially
(B) waxed
(E) remained exorbitant
(C)  dwindled
(F) barely stirred
